hackathon-description-text: For this edition of HackHarvard, we're intent on applying a timeline to the hackathon experience.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each team member gets first pick of one of the following: 4 Apple Watches, 4 Drones, and 4 Go Pros. Each team member will also receive a 1st place MLH medal.
Each team member gets first pick of one of the following: 4 Apple Watches, 4 Drones, and 4 Go Pros. Each team member will also receive a 2nd place MLH medal.
Each team member gets first pick of one of the following: 4 Apple Watches, 4 Drones, and 4 Go Pros. Each team member will also receive a 3rd place MLH medal.

Everything is part of the internet of things now - from your phone to your fitness band to your thermostat. Build a hack that utilizes private data being collected from your devices, and show how you can turn potential vulnerabilities into something constructive. Each team member will receive a Collector's Edition of Watch Dogs 2.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Watch Dogs 2 Best Device Privacy Hack MLH Prize

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Each team member will receive a HackHarassment Swag Bag
Each team member will receive a Domain.com Swag Bag
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Domain Name from Domain.com MLH Prize

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each team member will receive 1 TB Hard Drive
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Amazon Web Services (AWS) MLH Prize

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Hilles Library, 59 Shepard St, Cambridge, MA 02138, USA
hackathon-location-address: Hilles Library, 59 Shepard St, Cambridge, MA 02138, USA
